page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Annual Harvest Festivals are held in all three Chapels and SOUTH HILL CHURCH.In the Chapels,evening concerts and suppers celebrate Harvest Festival,foundation and Sunday School Anniversaries, many people returning to the area to share the rejoicing. "Favourite Hymn"evenings are popular. Congregations of all creeds visit each others'place of worship for these occasions.In STOKE CLIMSLAND,an incresingly large Produce Show is held annually,drawing many entries in it's open classes.This is followed by a Carnival with prizes for individual entries,decorated floats,and Majorettes.There is a competition for the best Carnival Queen entourage with entries from a very wide area.There are also commercial stalls. Annual Sheep dog trials are held also attracting entries from afar.
